sense.def:
Someone's status
je človekov položaj v družbi in pomen, ki ga ima za druge.

seg.quote: He came in search of wealth, status, and power.

sense.def:
Status
je tudi uradna razvrstitev, ki daje neki osebi, organizaciji ali državi določene pravice ali privilegije.

seg.quote: They appeared to have dropped their demand for status as political prisoners.
